import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import {useState, useEffect,} from "react"; const LoginPage=() =>{ const info = { email:'', password:'' } const handleChange = (event)=> { event.target.type==='email' ? info.email=event.target.value: info.password = event.target.value console.log(info) } return ( <>

); } export default LoginPage;
